title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8197-2.3 - Additional reports by pipeline companies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8197-2.3 - Additional reports by pipeline companies

State Regulations

In addition to the reports described in section
8197-2.1
(a) of this Subpart, pipeline companies shall file: (a) Form RP 4.6 - Transmission and

Distribution Pipe, including: (1)
account
number, SWIS code, and year installed; (2)
the diameter of the pipe; (3)
segregation of pipe in public and in
private right-of-way, in terms of: (i) number
of feet; (ii)
gross additions or
surviving dollars; and
(iii)
retirements; (b) The following information for the report
year both for the entire system and for the portion of the system within New

York State: (1)
barrels or dekatherms
delivered; (2)
pipeline mileage; and
(3)
investment in pipeline, both for transmission plant (gas) and trunk lines (product). (c) If an unregulated special
franchise owner, a copy of an audited financial statement which shall include
balance sheets and income and expense statements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8197-2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
